code: @Override @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") public EntityManagerFactory createContainerEntityManagerFactory(PersistenceUnitInfo info, Map properties) {     final List<String> mergedClassesAndPackages = new ArrayList<>(info.getManagedClassNames()).     if (info instanceof SmartPersistenceUnitInfo) {         mergedClassesAndPackages.addAll(((SmartPersistenceUnitInfo) info).getManagedPackages()).     }     return new EntityManagerFactoryBuilderImpl(new PersistenceUnitInfoDescriptor(info) {          @Override         public List<String> getManagedClassNames() {             return mergedClassesAndPackages.         }     }, properties).build(). }
